scripts.dev:ext: node build/clean-dist.js && concurrently "pnpm -F pkg-app dev:ext" "pnpm -F pkg-extension dev:ext" "node build/watch-merge.js"
scripts.build:ext: node build/clean-dist.js && pnpm sync-version && pnpm -F pkg-app build:ext && pnpm -F pkg-extension build:ext && node build/merge-dist.js
